name: Place 1
title: Air quality: Surreal skies grip New Yorkers - in pictures
description: The sight of one the most famous skylines on the planet shrouded in an orange hue has made front pages around the world. But for those living and working in New York City, it was a grim and worrying spectacle they could see for themselves.
